ygData.subject: Re: Bard Superstitions?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Brave Treilanin ran away Bravely ran away away When danger reared its ugly head, He bravely turned his tail and fled Yes Brave Treilanin turned about And
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 3 Sep 1999, Abraham Hardjana wrote:

> Perhaps it is time to be less noble and more parts
> chicken. It seems that I die more often when trying to
> care people, perhaps it would be better to be known as
> Treilanin the you yellow bellied chicken ....

Brave Treilanin ran away
Bravely ran away away
When danger reared its ugly head,
He bravely turned his tail and fled
Yes Brave Treilanin turned about
And gallantly he chickened out
Bravely taking to his feet
He beat a very brave retreat
Bravest of the brave Treilanin

(with apologies to Monty Python :-)
--
John H. Kim
kim@...
